name: "Assorted Polished Stone 5 lb. Bag"
description: The Mosser Lee 5 lb. Assorted Polished Stone makes it easy to add an attractive look to container plants by covering the soil with decorative stones. The stones help make magnificent displays for water gardens and fountains and are also excellent for use in terrariums, aquariums, candle projects and many other decorative projects.Dress up indoor and outdoor container plants by covering the soil with polished stonesUse as a vase medium for artificial or live flowersCreate beautiful water-garden and fountain displaysExcellent for terrariums, aquariums, dish gardens, candle displays and a wide array of craft and decorative projectsContains a 5 lb. assortment of polished stonesNote: Product may vary by store.
